title: Introduction to HTML & CSS
description: Learn the fundamental building blocks of web pages with HTML structure and CSS styling.

title: JavaScript Essentials
description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript to add interactivity to your websites.

title: Responsive Web Design with Flexbox & Grid
description: Build modern, responsive layouts that adapt to any screen size using CSS Flexbox and Grid.

title: Python for Data Analysis
description: Analyze and visualize data using Python libraries such as Pandas and Matplotlib.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: An introduction to supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques.

title: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Learn fundamental UI/UX design principles to create user-friendly digital experiences.

title: Graphic Design with Adobe Illustrator
description: Master vector graphics and create stunning designs using Adobe Illustrator.

title: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
description: Understand key digital marketing strategies, including SEO, content marketing, and social media.

title: SEO & Content Strategy
description: Boost website traffic by learning effective SEO techniques and content marketing strategies.

title: SQL for Data Analysis
description: Write efficient SQL queries to extract insights from databases.

title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Learn how to build complete web applications using front-end and back-end technologies.
